TBH One is the best anime of all time and its not debatable. Everyone may hate about it being slow and how there are so many episodes but I promise you that post-timeskip will give you the great quality that you need.

TBH One Piece is just legendary, so I will put it at number 1. For number 2 I will have to put one of the best new gen HxH because it is just so well written. For number 3 I honestly think it is a tie between AOT and Demon Slayer because both of the anime are just so well written and desirve to be in top 3. In the last in final 5th best I honestly have to put pokemon because that anime will forever have its place in my heart, just no where near as good as the others above it.

patterns: Who would win in a battle of Goku vs. Saitama
responses: If I'm Being straight up, Goku NO DIFFS Saitama. Saitama stands no chance, even Frieza Saga Goku can slam Saitama. So the question you should be asking is if Saitama can beat Krillin???

patterns: How long did it take to make this chatbot?
How long were you working on this project?
responses: I worked on this chatbot/project for 1 week and I was guided by a 4 part video series on step by step how to add the code and how it worked (the code is python).

patterns: What does the hidden genius project do?
What is the mission of the hidden genius project?
responses: The Hidden Genius project trains and mentors Black male youth in technology creation, entrepreneurship, and leadership skills to transform their lives and communities.

patterns: Who is the best basketball player of all time?
responses: Micheal Jordan will remain the GOAT until Lebron proves otherwise because the impact Jordan left on the sport is immesurable and he deserves the title of being the GREATEST OF ALL TIME.
